name: CanvasPattern
description: The CanvasPattern interface represents an opaque object describing a pattern, based on an image, a canvas or a video, created by the CanvasRenderingContext2D.createPattern() method.

members.name: CanvasPattern.setTransform()
members.description: Applies an SVGMatrix representing a linear transform to the pattern.

parameters.name: matrix
parameters.description: An SVGMatrix to use as the pattern's transformation matrix.
